objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#c41e1e;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#e33b20;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='triangle-gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD54F;stop-opacity:0.3'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FF8F00;stop-opacity:0.5'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg-gradient)'/><polygon points='540,150 640,320 440,320' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.15'/><polygon points='140,500 240,670 40,670' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.2'/><polygon points='940,600 1040,770 840,770' fill='#FFD54F' opacity='0.15'/><rect x='50' y='50' width='980' height='980' rx='20' fill='none' stroke='rgba(255,255,255,0.3)' stroke-width='5'/><rect x='80' y='80' width='920' height='920' rx='10' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.9'/><path d='M0,0 L400,0 L0,400 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.05'/><path d='M1080,1080 L680,1080 L1080,680 Z' fill='#000000' opacity='0.05'/><rect x='110' y='110' width='860' height='860' rx='10' fill='none' stroke='#FFB300' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='10,5'/></svg>

objects.text:
Bold Cheesy Flavor
Pack of 64 Snack-Size Bags
Classic Satisfying Crunch
Perfect for Parties & Gatherings

product_details.name: Doritos Flavored Tortilla Chips, Nacho Cheese, 1.75 Ounce (Pack of 64)
product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold and energetic design structured to highlight a product offer. Dominated by warm hues, the background uses a red-orange gradient with subtle geometrical accents and a bordered central white panel to focus the viewer's attention. The primary text layer ("heading") is a loud, uppercase offer announcement in deep red. Just beneath it, the "subheading" identifies the product and is styled in an orange-red hue for emphasis. The "description" block includes multiple lines of product benefits in dark gray, providing key details. Older pricing details are shown using a "strikethrough" shape over the "original_price" text, while the new "price" tag stands out prominently in bold red. A bright orange "cta_button" below emphasizes urgency, with white text ("cta") reading a compelling call-to-action. A product image ("product_image") placed on the right ensures immediate visual identification.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #c41e1e  
- Bright Orange-Red: #e33b20  
- Yellow-Orange: #FFB300  
- Charcoal Gray: #333333  
- Cool Gray: #777777  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: This product image of Doritos Nacho Cheese uses a bold and energetic color palette dominated by fiery red (#C32217), representing intensity and excitement, which forms the main background. The cheese chips utilize a vibrant golden yellow (#F8A71E) and deep orange (#D95E16), enhancing the product’s cheesy appeal. Black (#000000) is used for depth and contrast, especially in the logo and background triangle, while white (#FFFFFF) outlines the text for clarity. The triangle shape in the logo integrates a glowing orange blend (#FF6C00), smoothly transitioning with the chip color, creating visual continuity. These colors blend seamlessly while individually standing out for effective brand recall.
